channel.title: Command Line on Album.blog()
channel.description: Recent contents in "Command Line" on Album.blog()

item.title: Windows: setup Raspberry Pi in minutes
item.description: Just arrived a new [Raspberry Pi Zero W,][pi0w] or another model, and do you want quickly play with it?

item.title: Linux: set wlan interface on monitor mode at startup (Wi-Fi hacking on Raspbian)
item.description: I have had a lot of Raspberry products in these years: Pi 1B, Zero, Zero W, Zero WH, 4B (4GB).

item.title: Hugo HowTo: get localized comment counters with Disqus (playing with numbers, many languages and JavaScript)
item.description: This blog is built into two languages (Italian, primary, and English, secondary), each one with its home and some other sections/pages, generally without a translated counterpart.

item.title: Windows: some considerations (a very old joke)
item.description: Poor Windowsâ€¦ with 10 has become a quite stable system, but its reputation remains unchanged, at least since the infamous BSOD during Windows 98 presentation (another very old, organized joke, indeed).
